page.title: 06Employment.
page.content: On this estate there is quite a lot of unemployment.There are only one or two factories and these employ mostly women.Those men who do work have to travel out of the village to get employment.Some men are miners who travel to the coast and work in the pits there.There are firemen, factoryworkers,builders,deliverymen, and othertrades. My dad works at Blairs in Tow Law he mends the machines so the other men can make crates. My dad delivers tea for Ringtons.He drives a green van. My dad is a fireman he works at the firestation in Durhsm he has put a lot offires out. My dad works at Dawdon Colliery he is a face worker and digs out the coal.
